thread.title: WATCH: Girl 'Possessed By Devil' After Playing Ouija Board App | Lifestyle
thread.title_full: WATCH: Girl 'Possessed By Devil' After Playing Ouija Board App | Lifestyle | News | Qatar Day

author: unilad
title: WATCH: Girl 'Possessed By Devil' After Playing Ouija Board App | Lifestyle
text:
Footage has emerged of a young girl who became ‘possessed by the devil’ after using a Ouija board app on her phone.
Witnesses say the 18-year-old, identified as Patricia Quispe, was playing a mobile phone version of the board game with friends, The Mirror reports. When she returned home her parents noticed she was unwell, she then began fitting and foaming at the mouth, and her voice deepened into a raspy tone.
The girl, from Lima, Peru, was taken to hospital, where medics said she was extremely strong, making it difficult for them to control her. In the creepy footage she can be heard screaming ‘666’ in a deep rasping voice, followed by ‘let me go, let me go’.
It took medics half an hour to restrain her. She was then transferred to a psychiatric ward so doctors could work out what was wrong with her.
According to local media , people who witnessed the incident were convinced she was possessed by satanic spirits.
Well that’s terrifying.
